text: Yahya is a common Persian or Arabic name, and may refer to: ==People== * John (given name) * John the Baptist (1st century BC–1st century AD), a figure of Christianity known as the prophet Yahya in the Quran * Yahya (name), a common Arabic male given name * Yahya (Zaragoza), the 11th century ruler of Zaragoza ==Other uses== * Tepe Yahya, an archaeological site in Kermān Province, Iran * An ancient culture known as Yahya culture
title: Yahya
